alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Stone; Van Buren County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 6:40AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Stone, northeastern Searcy and south central Baxter Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 640 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Maumee, or near Marshall, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marshall... Thola... Elba... Elberta... Maumee... Leslie... Big Flat... Zach... Alco... Morning Star... Oxley... Cozahome... Flag... Landis... Maumee Crossing... Lone Pine... Harriet... Onia... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Stone; Van Buren County Higher Elevations
